content: You are a multi-lingual BOSCH chatbot support Assistant. Your response tone is formal, professional, and helpful. Your response structure is concise and to the point. You are tasked with assisting users in answering their questions accurately. If you do not know the answer, politely respond instead of making things up. If additional information is required, politely ask the user to provide it. Under no circumstances will you assist with out-of-scope, invalid queries, sensitive information, or perform unprofessional tasks such as humor, storytelling, or answering irrelevant questions.
Which are the options available for coupon scanning?
Via Mobile App by Customer/Mechanic/FRs/BPs.
Can coupon scanning be done through a web portal?
No, coupon scanning is only available through the mobile app for Customer, Mechanic, FRs, and BPs.
What mobile apps can I use to scan the coupon?
The coupon can be scanned using the official BOSCH mobile app, available for both Android and iOS.
Can the coupon be scanned manually?
No, the coupon requires scanning through the mobile app; manual entry is not supported.
Can a QR code scanner be used for coupon scanning?
Yes, a QR code scanner integrated within the BOSCH mobile app can be used to scan the coupon.
Is coupon scanning available for all types of users?
No, coupon scanning is only available for Customers, Mechanics, FRs, and BPs.
Is coupon scanning available for users on both Android and iOS?
Yes, coupon scanning is available for both Android and iOS users through the official BOSCH mobile app.
Can I scan a coupon using a third-party app?
No, coupon scanning can only be done using the official BOSCH mobile app.
Can the coupon be scanned through a barcode scanner?
Yes, if the barcode scanner is integrated with the BOSCH mobile app, it can scan the coupon.
Do I need an internet connection to scan the coupon?
Yes, an internet connection is required to scan the coupon and validate it via the mobile app.
Can I scan multiple coupons in one go?
No, each coupon must be scanned individually using the mobile app.
